caption.p: Ultrastructural features of a heart sample from biopsy postmortem of patient 54 years old female with atrial fibrillation as control subject without viral particles. The mitochondria show regular ridges and shorts sarcomere. The picture to 40,000Ã— of the electron microscopy was made with a Jeol JEM-1011 electronic microscope. Abbreviations: M = Mitochondria, S = Sarcomere.
